sentences.english: ShenXing smell speech flew into a rage and scolded Amy assume find out other peoples privacy.
sentences.chinese: 沈星聞言勃然大怒，訓斥艾米多管閒事打探他人隱私。

sentences.english: Well, I know what time Chester and Marsha said.
sentences.chinese: 我並不想多管閒事，不過告訴我你跟馬莎怎麼了。

sentences.english: But that lock didn't just keep busybodies at bay.
sentences.chinese: 但這個鎖並不只是爲了阻止多管閒事的人靠近。

sentences.english: I don't mean to be nosy, but tell me what happened between you and Marsha .
sentences.chinese: 我並不想多管閒事，不過告訴我你跟馬莎怎麼了。

sentences.english: But that lock didn’t just keep busybodies at bay.
sentences.chinese: 但這個鎖並不只是爲了阻止多管閒事的人靠近。

sentences.english: You are rather disposed to call his interference officious?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲他的干涉完全是多管閒事嗎？
